TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeOverrides extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许在使用 串行化或反序列化对象时替代属性、字段和类特性。

span.span: Allows you to override property, field, and class attributes when you use the to serialize or deserialize an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使 可以重写序列化一组对象的默认方式。The enables the to override the default way of serializing a set of objects. 以这种方式重写序列化具有两个用途：首先，可以控制和增加在 DLL 中找到的对象的序列化（即使你无法访问源）;其次，您可以创建一组可序列化类，但可以通过多种方式序列化这些对象。Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL--even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways. 例如，可以将类实例的成员作为 xml 属性进行序列化，而不是将其序列化为 xml 元素，从而使传输的文档更有效。For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport. 创建 对象后，将其作为参数传递到 构造函数。After you create an object, you pass it as an argument to the constructor. 生成的 使用所包含的数据 来重写属性，这些属性可控制对象的序列化方式。The resulting uses the data contained by the to override attributes that control how objects are serialized. 若要实现此目的，将 包含对象类型的集合，这些对象类型被重写，以及 与每个被重写的对象类型关联的对象。To accomplish this, the contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as an object associated with each overridden object type. 对象本身包含一组适当的属性对象，这些对象控制如何序列化每个字段、属性或类。The object itself contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized. 创建和使用对象的过程如下所示 ：The process for creating and using an object is as follows: 1. 创建 对象。Create an object. 2. 创建适合要重写的对象的属性对象。Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden. 例如，若要重写字段或属性，请 使用新的派生类型创建。For example, to override a field or property, create an , using the new, derived type. 您可以选择分配新的 ，或 重写基类的属性名称或命名空间。You can optionally assign a new , or that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace. 3. 将特性对象添加到相应的 属性或集合。Add the attribute object to the appropriate property or collection. 例如，你可以将添加 到对象的 集合 ，并指定要重写的成员名称。For example, you would add the to the collection of the object, specifying the member name that is being overridden. 4. 创建 对象。Create an object. 5. 使用 方法，将对象添加 到 对象。Using the method, add the object to the object. 如果要重写的对象是 或 ，则只需指定重写的对象的类型。If the object being overridden is an or , you need only to specify the type of the overridden object. 但如果要重写字段或属性，还必须指定重写成员的名称。But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member. 6. 构造时 ，将传递 到 构造函数。When constructing the , pass the to the constructor. 7. 使用生成的 序列化或反序列化派生类对象。Use the resulting to serialize or deserialize the derived class objects. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Orchestra` 的类，该类包含一个名为的字段，该字段 `Instruments` 返回对象的数组 `Instrument` 。The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为的第二个类 `Brass` 从 `Instrument` 类继承。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例使用类的实例 来重写 `Instrument` 字段，允许字段接受 `Brass` 对象。The example uses an instance of the class to override the `Instrument` field, allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含特性对象的联合，这将导致 为一组对象重写其默认序列化行为。The object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 根据 要重写的特定行为，选择要放置在对象中的属性对象。You choose the attribute objects to place in the object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，默认情况下，将 类成员序列化为 XML 元素。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果希望将成员序列化为 XM 特性，请创建 ，将其分配给的 属性 ，并将该 对象添加到 对象。If you want the member to be serialized as an XM attribute instead, you would create an , assign it to the property of an , and add the object to the object. 使用此重载重写 或 。Use this overload to override an or . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为的类，该类 `Band` 派生自名为的类 `Orchestra` 。The following example serializes a class named `Band` which is derived from a class named `Orchestra`. 该示例创建一个 对象，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The example creates an object, and assigns it to the property of an object. 然后，该示例调用 方法将对象添加 到 对象。The example then calls the method to add the object to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeOverrides.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含特性对象的联合，这将导致 为一组对象重写其默认序列化行为。The object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 根据 要重写的特定行为，选择要放置在对象中的属性对象。You choose the attribute objects to place in the object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，默认情况下，将 类成员序列化为 XML 元素。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果希望将成员作为 XML 特性序列化，则需要创建 ，将其分配给的 属性 ，并将该 对象添加到 对象。If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create an , assign it to the property of an , and add the object to the object. 尝试重写、、、或时，请使用此方法 。Use this method when attempting to override an , , , , or . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The following example creates an object, and assigns it to the property of an object. 然后，该示例在 创建之前将对象添加到 对象 。The example then adds the object to an object, before creating an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可返回 包含或对象的特性的对象 。Use this overload to return an object that contains attributes for an or object. 如果 对象包含重写 、 、 、或的对象 ，则必须使用指定重写成员和类型的重载。If the object contains objects that override an , , , , or , you must use the overload that specifies the overridden member as well as the type. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象、一个 对象和一个 对象。The following example creates an object, an object, and an object. 该示例将分配 给 对象的属性 ，并将该对象添加 到 对象。The example assigns the to the property of the object, and adds the object to the object. 最后，该示例通过将 序列化类的传递给对象来获取对象 。Lastly, the example gets the object by passing the of the serialized class to the object. 在此示例中， 为 `Group` 。In this example, the is `Group`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载返回一个 对象，该对象包含重写、、、或的对象 。Use this overload to return an object that contains objects that override an , , , , or . 如果 对象包含 或 ，则必须使用仅指定重写类型的重载。If the object contains an or , you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象、一个 和一个 对象。The following example creates an object, an , and an object. 该示例将分配 给 对象的属性 ，并将该对象添加 到 对象。The example assigns the to the property of the object and adds the object to the object. 最后，该示例通过将 序列化类和成员名称的传递给对象来获取对象 。Lastly, the example gets the object by passing the of the serialized class and member name to the object.
